CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 16 reads: "Michael M. Rapport, representative of Hamburg Brothers, in RCA Victor booth, demonstrates an RCA-Victor TV set to Mrs. Bettye Stokes of The Courier."
TitMainTitle: Michael M. Rapport showing an RCA-Victor television set to Bettye Stokes in the Hamburg Brothers booth for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Televisions--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
